languages.text: "Я..." {n}Кассия замирает в неуверенности, но через секунду ее испуганный взгляд черствеет.{/n} "Неужели решили предать меня, Вольный Торговец? После всего, через что мы прошли?"

traits.locale_text: "Я..." {n}Кассия замирает в неуверенности, но через секунду ее испуганный взгляд черствеет.{/n} "Неужели решили предать меня, Вольный Торговец? После всего, через что мы прошли?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "You truly intend to betray me, Rogue Trader? After all that we have been through?"

languages.text: 「あたくしを…」{n}カシアは口ごもって身じろぎもせず、怯えた目で一点を見つめている。{/n}「本当にあたくしを裏切るつもりですか、自由開拓者様？ずっと共にいたというのに？」
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "You truly intend to betray me, Rogue Trader? After all that we have been through?"

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしを…」{n}カシアは口ごもって身じろぎもせず、怯えた目で一点を見つめている。{/n}「本当にあたくしを裏切るつもりですか、自由開拓者様？ずっと共にいたというのに？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我……”{n}卡西娅迟疑地愣在哪里，但惊恐的目光却变得更加坚定。{/n}“我们明明一起经历过那么多事情，你真的打算背叛我吗，行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "You truly intend to betray me, Rogue Trader? After all that we have been through?"

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}卡西娅迟疑地愣在哪里，但惊恐的目光却变得更加坚定。{/n}“我们明明一起经历过那么多事情，你真的打算背叛我吗，行商浪人？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je... » {n}Cassia se fige un court instant, mais très vite son regard effrayé se fait plus dur.{/n} « Vous avez vraiment l'intention de me trahir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Après tout ce que nous avons vécu ? »
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "You truly intend to betray me, Rogue Trader? After all that we have been through?"

traits.locale_text: « Je... » {n}Cassia se fige un court instant, mais très vite son regard effrayé se fait plus dur.{/n} « Vous avez vraiment l'intention de me trahir, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Après tout ce que nous avons vécu ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Cassia se detiene, dubitativa, pero su mirada asustada se endurece.{/n} «¿De verdad va a traicionarme, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Después de todo lo que hemos pasado junt{mf|o|a}s?».
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "You truly intend to betray me, Rogue Trader? After all that we have been through?"

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}Cassia se detiene, dubitativa, pero su mirada asustada se endurece.{/n} «¿De verdad va a traicionarme, Comerciante Independiente? ¿Después de todo lo que hemos pasado junt{mf|o|a}s?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Cassia erstarrt zögerlich, doch dann verhärtet sich ihr verängstigter Blick.{/n} "Ihr wollt mich wirklich verraten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Nach allem, was wir durchgemacht haben?"
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "You truly intend to betray me, Rogue Trader? After all that we have been through?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..." {n}Cassia erstarrt zögerlich, doch dann verhärtet sich ihr verängstigter Blick.{/n} "Ihr wollt mich wirklich verraten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Nach allem, was wir durchgemacht haben?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ben..." {n}Cassia, tereddüt edip donakalıyor. En sonunda korku dolu bakışları iyice sertleşiyor.{/n} "Gerçekten bana ihanet etmeye mi niyetlisin Hür Tacir? Birlikte yaşadığımız onca şeye rağmen..."
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "You truly intend to betray me, Rogue Trader? After all that we have been through?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben..." {n}Cassia tereddüt edip donakalıyor, ardından da korku dolu bakışları sertleşiyor.{/n} "Gerçekten bana ihanet etmeye mi niyetlisin Hür Tacir? Birlikte yaşadığımız onca şeye rağmen..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
